pr_title: Add gas measurement to full import log line

timeline.message:
Add gas measurement to full import log line

To provide more context to admins and to add more meaning the full sync
log lines report the amount of gas processed in MegaGas/Second.  Some
blocks are fuller than others and this provides a gauge as to wether the
import is slowing down or if the blocks are filling up.

Signed-off-by: Danno Ferrin <danno.ferrin@gmail.com>

spotless and changelog

Signed-off-by: Danno Ferrin <danno.ferrin@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: Why not just allow it to log the 0? It doesn't do much harm and it makes it more consistent, grepable, etc.
timeline.author: RatanRSur

replies.bodyText: updated it to log a - when either time is not accurate or gas burnt is zero.  Greps consistently now.
replies.author: shemnon

timeline.message:
keep a consistant greppable line.
